Title: Poison
Description: Creature you hit is Poisoned. It takes 3 damage each round.

Title: Poisoned
Description: Take 3 damage on the begining of each turn.

Title: Double Attack
Description: You deal twice as much damage to enemies

Title: Revive
Description: You get 1 more chance to show what you got. Revive with half HP.

Title: Stone Skin
Description: You stood in magical mud; it looks like some kind of protection for you. The damage dealt to you is halved.

Title: Ice Floor
Description: You stand on ice ground. Your chance to hit attack is halved.

Title: Eye for Weakness
Description: You deal 4 more damage if your attacks success.

Title: Swing Attack
Description: Deal full damage to target and half damage to other enemies in same column.

Title: Ghost
Description: After you get damage the next round you will be non targetable.

Title: Dissarm
Description: You have 50% chance to dissarm enemy after successfull attack.

Title: Lucky Hit
Description: You have 50% chance to increase ability success by 20%

Title: Human Shield
Description: You will get damage instead of ally in same column. The damage is reduced by 50%.

Title: Headshot
Description: You will always deal maximum damage on attack success.

Title: Stun
Description: You have 50% chance to stun target.
